[mk_page_section][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”24″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”line-grey”]Our Fee Structure[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”28″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none”]Time-Related Services[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1560826632430{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]We recognise that not all strata companies are the same, and therefore believe that strata management services need to be flexible to allow for such variations in responsibilities and management requirements.

Unlike many strata managers, we primarily charge on a time-related basis for any work pertaining to your Strata Company.

We charge a minimal fixed-fee per lot to cover a range of routine accounting and secretarial services (specified in our management agreement).

Any additional services (as specified in our management agreement) will be charged on a time-related basis.[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”28″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none”]What are the benefits?[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1560826666959{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]We believe this is a fairer fee structure as our charges are an accurate reflection of the work we do, as opposed to the all-inclusive fixed-fee charged by most other strata managers.

It allows for greater flexibility in enabling us to tailor our services specific to the needs of your strata company.

As such, the council of owners may be able to identify functions of management that they can act upon themselves, without engaging the strata manager’s services.

This also means that a strata company will pay less in a quiet year than they would in a busy year – reflective of the amount of work required to perform the functions of management.[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”28″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none”]Transparency[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1560826686984{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]We will provide your treasurer with monthly reports on the income and expenditure of the strata company, together with an activity summary of the work we have done, and an invoice for our fees and charges. This will ensure transparency and allow you to query any charges as they are incurred.[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”28″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none”]Services tailored to your needs[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1560826706244{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]If there are specific services attributable to the management of your scheme that you wish to have included in the Strata Management Agreement, or there are services listed that are not appropriate to your scheme, we remain willing to negotiate with you.

This may also include the provision of fixed-fee contracts in cases where all parties believe this would best suit the needs of your strata company.[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section bg_image=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/jdss-background-green.jpg” attachment=”fixed” video_color_mask=”#cfd628″ video_opacity=”0.5″ top_shadow=”true” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][mk_fancy_title color=”#ffffff” size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ font_style=”normal” txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” align=”center” animation=”scale-up”]Looking for New Strata Management?[/mk_fancy_title][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][mk_button dimension=”savvy” size=”large” url=”http://www.jdstrata.com.au/services” align=”center” fullwidth=”true” margin_bottom=”40″ outline_skin=”custom” outline_active_color=”#ffffff” outline_active_text_color=”#ffffff” outline_hover_bg_color=”#ffffff” outline_hover_color=”#cfd628″]Our Services[/mk_button][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][mk_button dimension=”savvy” size=”large” url=”http://www.jdstrata.com.au/request-a-quote” align=”center” fullwidth=”true” margin_bottom=”40″ outline_skin=”custom” outline_active_color=”#ffffff” outline_active_text_color=”#ffffff” outline_hover_bg_color=”#ffffff” outline_hover_color=”#cfd628″]Request a Quote[/mk_button][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section]
